# Draft:Sun King (company)

The Sun King company provides reliable off grid electricity using solar industry. This Benin based company is offering its services in 46 countries, it has a customer base of 25,198,917 households.
In many countries many people are not connected to an electricity grid. It follows that power is typically carbon based. This may be diesel generated of the use of fire wood. When this is replaced by cheap electricity, it reduces noxious fumes while cooking and it saves the money needed for the purchase of diesel or wood. Thanks to loans provided for the purchase of the solar panel, battery and assorted electric equipment, people save money, children can study in the evening and it improves the living environment.
Financing is available partially thanks to carbon credits that help finance the equipment. Sun King currently has extended $1.38 billion loans for the purchase of solar products. With  34,000+ field agents, it provides jobs and this will increase with its own manufacturing in Africa.
The company has a [https://sunking.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Sun-Kings-Sustainable-Financing-Framework.pdf Sustainable Finance Framework] that promises to bring service to the currently underserved. It monitors its effect, and reports on this.
Sun King adheres to the COGLA Consumer Protection Code.
The Sun King Financing Limited provides pay-as-you-go receivables. It is also funded by loans from the FMO entrepreneurial development bank
